data.message: Finally, a company looking to better the world for others and not just their own profit margin.

replies.message: Thanks a lot for your great words, Teddy. We're here to help our community and make the world a better place! -Rey
Oh teddy its for profit don't you lie to yourself

Al, those who bless others get blessed, that's just how it works. It is more blessed to give than to recieve. It doesn't matter who you are or what you believe, karma, yin yang, reap what you sow, do unto others....it seems to just work that way to me my friend. I liked seeing those who are blind in this video smile, if Facebook is bringing joy to people's lives, I hope they continue to be blessed. And Al I hope you are blessed too man. :)
